entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -21.7°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
